on reading compounds: 弁【ベン】speech, tongue, talk, eloquence, dialect, brogue, accent, bento, Japanese box lunch, petal, valve, Oversight Department, division of the daijokan under the ritsuryo system responsible for controlling central and provincial governmental offices

詭弁【キベン】sophistry, sophism, chicanery, play on words
